summary:
Daedra Facts Presented by Hermaeus Mora

These are facts about the world of Tamriel presented by Hermaeus Mora
descriptionHtml:
Daedra Facts by Mazetism
#######################

Replacer for the Loading Screen
10/20/2013



>DESCRIPTION<

This mod gives you facts about the world of Nirn and its people through the words of the Hermaeus Mora.
If you easily get offended by the facts Hermaeus Mora states, this loading screen is not for you. 
Replaces the vanilla loading screens with 25 different fact loading screens like shown in pictures above.


>Installation<

Unpack the contents of the archive into your skyrim/data folder and activate the esp file in your chosen manager, to remove simply deactivate the esp file. That\'s it. It\'s pretty easy.

I\'ve uploaded a zip of just pictures of facts I\'ve made so far.

>Future updates<

I\'m planning on adding more facts and one that involves my Dunmer Teacher.
author: Mazetism

files.name: Daedra Facts by Mazetism Pictures only
